title: Bug 4971: Unexpected behavior with 'copy package'
description: When using the 'copy package' feature in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui, unexpected behavior occurs. After selecting a package called 'ui' as the destination, the resulting package 'xx' still contains a package named 'ui'.
OB: After selecting the 'ui' package as the destination package, the 'xx' package still contains a package named 'ui'.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new project named 'xxx'. 2. In the package viewer, select a package in project 'A'. For example, choose a package from the context menu. 3. Select the 'copy' option from the context menu.
